title: No children node listed when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, no children nodes are listed.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the data source is changed, the new data source's children should be listed.
SR:
1. Open the data set editor page in the query tab. 
2. Select a data set. 
3. Change the data source for the selected data set. 
4. Observe if the children nodes of the new data source are listed.
